mdRecord.dcterms:description: Used for light industrial fabrication during World War II; direct railroad connection ran through the building. Purchased by the University mid-1970s and used as headquarters of UVa Transportation. Now demolished. -- UVa Facilities Management Historian [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
